Class ProjectedView<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object

  • Type Parameters:
    IN - Vector type
    OUT - Vector type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, Relation<OUT>, HierarchicalResult, Result

    public class ProjectedView<IN,OUT>
extends AbstractHierarchicalResult
implements Relation<OUT>
    Projected relation view (non-materialized)

      • iterDBIDs

        public DBIDIter iterDBIDs()
        Description copied from interface: Relation
        Get an iterator access to the DBIDs. To iterate over all IDs, use the following code fragment: 
         for(DBIDIter iter = relation.iterDBIDs(); iter.valid(); iter.advance()) {
    DBID id = iter.getDBID();
 }
        Specified by:
        iterDBIDs in interface Relation<OUT>
